title: I just hit level 5 and didn't get any hextech chests??
body:
Uh I just hit lvl 5 and I was told you get a free premium hextech chest and I didn't get one...

I've verified and i've closed the client twice now.

replies.body:
[It's level 3 that you should be receiving this chest.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp) Did you receive the 400RP upon level 3 (which the premium box replaced), prior to the introduction of the hextech crafting system?

If you haven't received either, please send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and hopefully Riot can help you out.

Wait I've got a question, does everyone who had lvl 3+ with some champions get this 400 RP
before the Hexteck thing came out, because I had a few.
Or is it only once?

They're talking about their summoner level, not the lv of champion mastery points 
You used to be able to get 400 rp when you reached lv3 
Now your're supposed to get a chest :)

Oh right, I remember that now.
I totally forgot about that switching thing, even tho I prefer 400 rp over 1 single chest I can earn by playing the game XD

Yeah but you can get some really cool loot from those chests.. did that either make you change your mind or atleast watch one of those NEW!!! HEXTECH CRAFTING SYSTEM youtuber cringe things?
Hope it did because if you want to be a noticable member of this community you gotta be interesting man

lol what?
7 months ago?

Noticeable member of the community?
your from EUNE, and I'm an extremely active member of the OCE boards lol
Same no chests what is this
I didnt get my chest either feels bad man
Be thankful, you'll never get hooked on buying chests.
